0: I wanna tell the whole world about a friend of mine
1: This little light of mine, I'm feelin' let it shine
2: I'm feelin' take y'all back to them better times
3: I'm feelin' talk about my mama if y'all don't mind (hey Mama)
4: I was three years old when you and I move to the Chi
5: Late December, harsh winter gave me a cold
6: You fix me up something that was good for my soul
7: Famous home chicken soup, can I have another bowl (hey Mama)
8: You work late nights just to keep on the lights
9: Mommy got me training wheels so I can keep on my bike
10: And you would give me anything in this world
11: Michael Jackson leather and the glove, but didn't give me a curl (hey Mama)
12: And you never put no man over me, and I LOVE you for that Mommy can't you see?
13: Seven years old, caught you with tears in your eyes
14: Cause a nigga cheatin', tellin' you lies, then I started to cry (hey Mama)
15: As we knelt on the kitchen floor
16: I said, "Mommy, I'ma love you 'til you don't HURT no more!"
17: And when I'm older, you ain't gotta WORK no more
18: And I'ma get you that mansion that we couldn't afford (hey Mama)
19: See your unbreakable, unmistakable, highly capable, lady that's making loot
20: A living legend too, just look at what Heaven do, sent us an angel, and I thank you
title: Hey Mama (Remix)
